name: BGSJAM 4 Game Pack
description:
We've taken four of the completed games from BGSJAM 4 and put them into one pack for you to download and play!

  • Not One More Day - a multiplayer "lifematch" from John Futscher and others
  • Things Are Not What They Seem At The Childrens Moonbase Hospital - an action-packed 2D platformer from Don Boody and others
  • Triple Threat - a pinball game (or is it?) from Chris Langford and others
  • You Can't See Color - top-down action exploration with a keytar! From J. Greg Giles and others.

Each of these four games were created in 48 hours (or less!) based on the theme "Things Are Not What They Seem" for BGSJAM 4, the fourth official game jam of Buffalo Game Space.

Buffalo Game Space is a place for people to collaborate, learn, and play.

As a 501(c)(3) non-profit, BGS is dedicated to helping people make games, by offering the educational, mentorship, and equipment resources to both professional and aspiring game developers. The BGSJAM 4 Game Pack is free to download, with all donations going towards helping BGS continue their mission to help support the growing games industry in Western New York.
